EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Intro to Spring Framework 4.0 10AM.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Introduction to Spring Framework 4.0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Introduction to Spring Framework 4.0 and Juergen Hoeller. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Thursday, January 9, 2014 North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=667495707> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 667 495 707
Thank you,
